name: The Fool
description: The Fool represents new beginnings, spontaneity, and embracing the unknown with optimism.

name: The Magician
description: The Magician represents focused will, skill, and the power to manifest your intentions into reality.

name: The High Priestess
description: The High Priestess represents intuition, inner wisdom, and connection to the subconscious mind.

name: The Empress
description: The Empress represents abundance, creativity, fertility, and nurturing feminine energy.

name: The Emperor
description: The Emperor represents authority, structure, stability, and masculine leadership energy.

name: The Hierophant
description: The Hierophant represents tradition, spiritual wisdom, conformity, and established institutions.

name: The Lovers
description: The Lovers represents harmony, relationships, moral choices, and the union of opposites.

name: The Chariot
description: The Chariot represents determination, control, victory through willpower, and focused direction.

name: Strength
description: Strength represents inner fortitude, gentle control, patience, and compassionate influence.

name: The Hermit
description: The Hermit represents introspection, inner guidance, spiritual searching, and wisdom through solitude.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: Wheel of Fortune represents cycles, fate, karma, changing luck, and life's natural ups and downs.

name: Justice
description: Justice represents balance, fairness, truth, accountability, and ethical decision-making.

name: The Hanged Man
description: The Hanged Man represents surrender, patience, new perspectives, and wisdom through sacrifice.

name: Death
description: Death represents transformation, endings that lead to new beginnings, and necessary change.

name: Temperance
description: Temperance represents balance, moderation, patience, healing, and the harmonious blending of opposites.

name: The Devil
description: The Devil represents temptation, bondage, materialism, and the need to confront your shadow self.

name: The Tower
description: The Tower represents sudden change, revelation, liberation through destruction, and shocking breakthroughs.

name: The Star
description: The Star represents hope, inspiration, spiritual guidance, healing, and renewed faith in the future.

name: The Moon
description: The Moon represents illusion, intuition, the subconscious, dreams, and hidden or unclear situations.

name: The Sun
description: The Sun represents joy, success, vitality, enlightenment, and the achievement of happiness and clarity.

name: Judgement
description: Judgement represents spiritual awakening, inner calling, rebirth, renewal, and hearing your higher purpose.

name: The World
description: The World represents completion, fulfillment, harmony, success, and the achievement of cosmic wholeness.

name: Ace of Cups
description: Ace of Cups represents new emotional beginnings, love, spiritual awakening, and overflowing feelings.

name: Two of Cups
description: Two of Cups represents partnership, mutual attraction, connection, and harmonious relationships.

name: Three of Cups
description: Three of Cups represents celebration, friendship, community, collaboration, and joyful social connections.

name: Four of Cups
description: Four of Cups represents contemplation, apathy, reevaluation, and the need for introspective withdrawal.

name: Five of Cups
description: Five of Cups represents disappointment, regret, loss, grief, and the need to process emotional setbacks.

name: Six of Cups
description: Six of Cups represents nostalgia, childhood memories, innocence, simplicity, and reconnection with the past.

name: Seven of Cups
description: Seven of Cups represents illusion, wishful thinking, too many choices, fantasy, and unrealistic expectations.

name: Eight of Cups
description: Eight of Cups represents moving on, seeking deeper meaning, spiritual quest, and leaving disappointment behind.

name: Nine of Cups
description: Nine of Cups represents satisfaction, contentment, emotional fulfillment, luxury, and gratitude for abundance.

name: Ten of Cups
description: Ten of Cups represents emotional fulfillment, family happiness, harmony, and perfect contentment in relationships.

name: Page of Cups
description: Page of Cups represents creative sensitivity, dreamy imagination, artistic expression, and youthful emotional openness.

name: Knight of Cups
description: Knight of Cups represents romantic idealism, emotional passion, artistic pursuits, and following your heart's desires.

name: Queen of Cups
description: Queen of Cups represents compassionate wisdom, intuitive nurturing, emotional intelligence, and psychic sensitivity.

name: King of Cups
description: King of Cups represents emotional mastery, compassionate leadership, diplomatic wisdom, and balanced emotional control.

name: Ace of Wands
description: Ace of Wands represents inspiration, new creative beginnings, growth potential, and the spark of new energy.

name: Two of Wands
description: Two of Wands represents planning, making decisions, personal power, progress, and having a vision for the future.

name: Three of Wands
description: Three of Wands represents expansion, looking ahead, overseas opportunities, foresight, and leadership in progress.

name: Four of Wands
description: Four of Wands represents celebration, harmony, home, marriage, community, and achieving stable milestones.

name: Five of Wands
description: Five of Wands represents competition, conflict, struggles, disagreement, and chaotic competitive energy.

name: Six of Wands
description: Six of Wands represents victory, success, achievement, recognition, triumph, and confident public acclaim.

name: Seven of Wands
description: Seven of Wands represents defensive perseverance, maintaining your position, challenge, and determined resistance.

name: Eight of Wands
description: Eight of Wands represents speed, swift action, rapid movement, hasty decisions, and fast communication.

name: Nine of Wands
description: Nine of Wands represents resilience, persistence, the last stand, defensive positioning, and wounded determination.

name: Ten of Wands
description: Ten of Wands represents burden, responsibility, hard work, achievement through effort, and carrying heavy loads.

name: Page of Wands
description: Page of Wands represents enthusiastic exploration, discovery, free spirit, adventure, and fearless eagerness.

name: Knight of Wands
description: Knight of Wands represents action, adventure, fearlessness, impulsive energy, and daring heroic passion.

name: Queen of Wands
description: Queen of Wands represents confident leadership, warm optimism, energetic charm, and self-assured strength.

name: King of Wands
description: King of Wands represents visionary leadership, taking control, honor, seeing the big picture, and bold command.

name: Ace of Swords
description: Ace of Swords represents clarity, breakthrough, new ideas, mental focus, truth, and clear communication.

name: Two of Swords
description: Two of Swords represents difficult decisions, indecision, stalemate, avoidance, and being at a crossroads.

name: Three of Swords
description: Three of Swords represents heartbreak, betrayal, separation, sadness, emotional pain, and grieving loss.

name: Four of Swords
description: Four of Swords represents rest, meditation, contemplation, recovery, passive withdrawal, and peaceful stillness.

name: Five of Swords
description: Five of Swords represents conflict, defeat, winning at all costs, betrayal, revenge, and hollow victory.

name: Six of Swords
description: Six of Swords represents transition, moving on, travel, healing, recovery, and moving forward from difficulties.

name: Seven of Swords
description: Seven of Swords represents deception, theft, getting away with something, stealth, and strategic cunning.

name: Eight of Swords
description: Eight of Swords represents mental imprisonment, feeling trapped, restriction, powerlessness, and being a victim.

name: Nine of Swords
description: Nine of Swords represents anxiety, worry, fear, nightmares, guilt, mental anguish, and deep despair.

name: Ten of Swords
description: Ten of Swords represents betrayal, backstabbing, hitting rock bottom, complete defeat, and crisis endings.

name: Page of Swords
description: Page of Swords represents curiosity, eager learning, mental energy, communication, vigilance, and alert awareness.

name: Knight of Swords
description: Knight of Swords represents swift action, fast thinking, determination, assertiveness, and direct approach.

name: Queen of Swords
description: Queen of Swords represents independent wisdom, unbiased judgment, direct communication, and perceptive insight.

name: King of Swords
description: King of Swords represents intellectual power, authority, truth, systematic rules, discipline, and structured routine.

name: Ace of Pentacles
description: Ace of Pentacles represents new opportunities, manifestation, financial opportunities, abundance, and material security.

name: Two of Pentacles
description: Two of Pentacles represents balancing priorities, time management, adaptability, resourcefulness, and flexible juggling.

name: Three of Pentacles
description: Three of Pentacles represents teamwork, collaboration, building together, group efforts, and learning from others.

name: Four of Pentacles
description: Four of Pentacles represents conservation, frugality, security, control, scarcity mindset, and holding tight to resources.

name: Five of Pentacles
description: Five of Pentacles represents hardship, loss, isolation, feeling left out, and experiencing hard times.

name: Six of Pentacles
description: Six of Pentacles represents generosity, charity, giving and receiving, sharing wealth, and community balance.

name: Seven of Pentacles
description: Seven of Pentacles represents assessment, reaping what you sow, evaluating results, and patient cultivation.

name: Eight of Pentacles
description: Eight of Pentacles represents apprenticeship, hard work, dedication, skill development, and focused craftsmanship.

name: Nine of Pentacles
description: Nine of Pentacles represents independence, luxury, self-sufficiency, material success, and sophisticated abundance.

name: Ten of Pentacles
description: Ten of Pentacles represents legacy, culmination, inheritance, family wealth, establishment, and traditional completion.

name: Page of Pentacles
description: Page of Pentacles represents ambition, diligence, scholarly learning, new practical ideas, and manifestation focus.

name: Knight of Pentacles
description: Knight of Pentacles represents efficiency, hard work, routine, conservatism, methodical dedication, and reliable progress.

name: Queen of Pentacles
description: Queen of Pentacles represents practical wisdom, down-to-earth generosity, resourceful organization, and welcoming abundance.

name: King of Pentacles
description: King of Pentacles represents abundance, prosperity, financial security, control, disciplined success, and reliable power.
